评论详情: What I like about this lightweight sweater is the softness. It's incredible soft and comfortable.
I am a large and ordered the large and it fit perfect.
Bought this for my daughter for Valentine's Day and she loved it! Its super cute and a nice thickness sweatshirt - not too thick or too thin.
The cutest ever! Wonderful quality and fits to size. ❤️
Just the fabric weight and quality I was looking for in a weekend shirt. Comfortable, nice loose but not baggy style and no pilling. Works well for my style.
